Html:
Hello.

For a start - extremely useful project !

I'd like to see examples on how to add RibbonUI controls other than 'button' which
is easily implemented after studying the examples.

Could You please post a quick tip or point to a link where I can find the way to add a combobox (or dropdown) and a checkbox ?

What needs to be defined in RibbonUI.xml and which events need to be addressed ?
( SelectedIndexChanged,  ... ) How to add items, etc.

Full example would be fine or a link to it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Currently I'm still writing code but I started to think about deployment. How can it be
done using InnoSetup ?

If I go about and try doing it 'by hand', what do I have to do then ?
Where to copy the builded dll-s and is it enough to modify & use the
provided 'OfficeAddinSampleRegFile.reg' ?

Thanks again and thank You for your time.

Tone

OK - got examples I need here: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa338202%28v=office.12%29.aspx

If anybody's stuck like I was.
